description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot configuration class WebConfig, which enables Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) for specific local development origins, allowing the frontend (e.g., React, Vue) to communicate with the backend during development.

classes.name: WebConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class to set up CORS filter allowing specified origins for development.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Creates and registers a CorsFilter bean that allows cross-origin requests from localhost and 127.0.0.1 on specified ports, with common HTTP methods and headers.
